Class LDL

java.lang.Object
  LDL
Direct Known Subclasses:
Knallgraudetector, Shuyodetector, Tikadetector
public abstract class LDL
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class LDL provides a framework to easily add and test new Language Detection libraries.
